item.title: CVE-2022-0615|2024-09-16T17:37:36.148Z -- eset%2C%20spol.%20s%20r.o. -- endpoint%20antivirus%20for%20linux
item.description: Use-after-free in eset_rtp kernel module used in ESET products for Linux allows potential attacker to trigger denial-of-service condition on the system.
